soffico.customerapi.message

Class MessageAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • soffico.customerapi.message.MessageAdapter

  • public class MessageAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements a simple adapter/facade pattern that encapsulates all functions for creating, converting and acessing orchestra internal messages

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String PROP_DYNAMIC
      Dynamic or typed serialization. true --> dynamic, false --> static type lookup
      static java.lang.String PROP_ENCODING
      Encoding used for serialization of the message
      static java.lang.String PROP_IGNOREDELIMITERS
      Ignore sequence escape delimiters

      Ignore sequence formatting symbols

      Ignore sequence hexadecimal data

      Ignore sequence local escapes
      static java.lang.String PROP_LAX
      enable/disable the laxmode for hl7-serialization.
      static java.lang.String PROP_MESSAGETYPEPATTERN
      Messagetype pattern used to resolve the message type for a hl7 message

      Separator char used for seperating single elements within csv serialization

      Quotechar used for quoting elements during csv serialization

      Separator char used for seperating single elements within csv serialization

        public static emds.epi.decl.server.message.Message convertXMLStringToMessage(java.lang.String messageData,
                                                                             java.lang.String encoding)
                                                                      throws OrchestraCustomerException
        This function converts the given xml document in string representation to an orchestra structured message
        Parameters:
        messageData - Data that should be converted to a binary message
        encoding - String encoding that should be used. e.g. UTF-8,
        Returns:
        Throws:
        OrchestraCustomerException

      • createMessageForNode

        public static emds.epi.decl.server.message.Message createMessageForNode(org.w3c.dom.Node node)
                                                                 throws OrchestraCustomerException
        This methods creates a orchestra message from the given xml document node. The node is completly cloned, so that subsequent changes to the original source will not be reflected at the target message
        Parameters:
        node - DOM-Node (Element)
        Returns:
        a newly created orchestra message
        Throws:
        emds.epi.decl.exceptions.EpiBaseException
        OrchestraCustomerException

      • convertBinaryMessageToString

        public static java.lang.String convertBinaryMessageToString(emds.epi.decl.server.message.Message message,
                                                            java.lang.String encoding)
                                                     throws OrchestraCustomerException
        This method converts the given message to a string representation with the required encoding. The conversion to a string is only possible if the binary message contains valid characters. E.g. a 0-byte could't be convertet to String representation.
        Parameters:
        message - Binary message
        encoding - Encoding of the binary message
        Returns:
        A string representation of the binary message
        Throws:
        OrchestraCustomerException

      • convertStringToBinaryMessage

        public static emds.epi.decl.server.message.Message convertStringToBinaryMessage(java.lang.String scenarioIdentifier,
                                                                                java.lang.String messageData,
                                                                                boolean treatAsMassdata,
                                                                                java.lang.String encoding)
                                                                         throws OrchestraCustomerException
        This function converts the given string into a binary orchestra message
        Parameters:
        scenarioIdentifier - Unique identifier of the process scenario
        messageData - Data that should be converted to a binary message
        treatAsMassdata - If set to true, the message is created in massdata mode.
        encoding - String encoding that should be used. e.g. UTF-8,
        Returns:
        Throws:
        OrchestraCustomerException

      • convertHL7MessageToBinary

        public static emds.epi.decl.server.message.Message convertHL7MessageToBinary(java.lang.String scenarioIdentifier,
                                                                             emds.epi.decl.server.message.Message sourceMessage,
                                                                             boolean treatAsMassdata,
                                                                             java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> props)
                                                                      throws OrchestraCustomerException
        This function converts a structured hl7 message to a binary representation.
        Parameters:
        scenarioIdentifier - Unique identifier of the scenario
        sourceMessage - Source HL7 message
        treatAsMassdata - If set to ture, the message will be generated in massdata mode
        props - Properties for overwriting the standard behaviour. Allowed props are PROP_DYNAMIC, PROP_MESSAGETYPEPATTERN, PROP_LAX, PROP_ENCODING
        Returns:
        Throws:
        OrchestraCustomerException

                                                                                           java.lang.String encoding)

        sourceMessage - Source HL7 message

      • convertCSVMessageToBinary

        public static emds.epi.decl.server.message.Message convertCSVMessageToBinary(java.lang.String scenarioIdentifier,
                                                                             emds.epi.decl.server.message.Message sourceMessage,
                                                                             boolean treatAsMassdata,
                                                                             java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> props)
                                                                      throws OrchestraCustomerException
        This function converts a structured CSV message to a binary representation. The following properties can be used to overwrite the standard behaviour of the channel SEPARATOR,QUOTECHAR. Put this properties into the prop maps with according values
        Parameters:
        scenarioIdentifier - Unique identifier of the scenario
        sourceMessage - Source HL7 message
        treatAsMassdata - If set to ture, the message will be generated in massdata mode
        props - Properties for overwriting the standard behaviour of the csv serializer. Allowed props are PROP_QUOTECHAR, PROP_SEPARATOR, PROP_NEWLINE and PROP_ENCODING
        Returns:
        the created structured message
        Throws:
        OrchestraCustomerException

      • convertMessageWithTypeSerializerToBinary

        public static emds.epi.decl.server.message.Message convertMessageWithTypeSerializerToBinary(java.lang.String scenarioIdentifier,
                                                                                            emds.epi.decl.server.message.Message sourceMessage,
                                                                                            java.lang.String messageTypeName,
                                                                                            boolean treatAsMassdata)
                                                                                     throws OrchestraCustomerException
        This function converts a structured message to a binary representation. The serialization is defined by the given messagetype and its serialization information
        Parameters:
        scenarioIdentifier - Unique identifier of the scenario
        sourceMessage - Source HL7 message
        treatAsMassdata - If set to ture, the message will be generated in massdata mode
        Returns:
        Throws:
        OrchestraCustomerException

      • splitMessage

        public static emds.epi.decl.server.message.MessageList splitMessage(emds.epi.decl.server.message.Message message,
                                                                    boolean wantMassdata,
                                                                    boolean keepRoot)
                                                             throws emds.epi.decl.exceptions.EpiBaseException
        Split the given message on the nodes of the first level. For every node, a new message is created and added to a message list. If the keepRoot is enabled, the Root-Element of the original message is added to every created messages. Other
        Parameters:
        message - Structured message that shuld be splitted
        wantMassdata - Create messages in massdata mode
        keeyRoot - If set to true, the original root element is copied to the resulting messages. Otherwise the child element itself is treated as document root.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        emds.epi.decl.exceptions.EpiBaseException

      • getBinaryMessageContent

        public static byte[] getBinaryMessageContent(emds.epi.decl.server.message.Message message)
                                      throws OrchestraCustomerException
        This method retrieves the content of a binary message as byte array.
        Parameters:
        message - Binary message
        Returns:
        the content bytes
        Throws:
        OrchestraCustomerException
